articles.title: EU drafts plan to label gas and nuclear investments as green - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union has drawn up plans to label some natural gas and nuclear energy projects as "green" investments after a year-long battle between governments over which investments are truly climate-friendly.
articles.content: Jan 1 (Reuters) - The European Union has drawn up plans to label some natural gas and nuclear energy projects as "green" investments after a year-long battle between governments over which investment… [+3988 chars]

articles.author: Paul Hyland
articles.title: Rare Egyptian vulture spotted in Co Roscommon - Independent.ie
articles.description: The National Parks and Wildlife Service (NPWS) has confirmed that a vulture, which normally resides in parts of Southern Europe and Africa, was spotted in county Roscommon on New Year’s Eve morning.
articles.content:

articles.author: James Lee
articles.title: Euro doomed? EU currency 'may not last forever' as it enters 'most perilous decade yet' - Express
articles.description: THE EURO could be doomed according to one financial expert who says the European-wide currency is entering its most perilous decade yet as soaring inflation rocks the financial stability and security of the single currency.

articles.title: Euro marks 20 eventful years - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The euro on Saturday marks 20 years since people began to use the single European currency, overcoming initial doubts, price concerns and a debt crisis to spread across the region.
